ActBudget and Economic Statement Implementation Act, 2007
SubjectBudget and Economic Statement Implementation Act, 2007
PrecisOrder fixing December 1, 2008 as the day on which Sections 136 and 137 of the BUDGET AND ECONOMIC STATEMENT IMPLEMENTATION ACT, 2007, being Chapter 35 of the Statutes of Canada, 2007, come into force. Section 136 enacts the Canada Disability Savings Act, while section 137 makes a consequential amendment to the Children's Special Allowances Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2008-0063 Publication Date: 2008-06-25
AttachmentsAttachment
